Easy to Clean & Reusable – Vakly adult toilet bottles/fluid collectors feature a smooth, nonstick interior that cleans easily with standard household disinfectants. short_description: 2-Pack Male Urinal Bottles: Our male urinal bottles provide instant bladder relief for men, whether they are home or on the go! Made of durable HDPE plastic, our portable urinal bottles are sturdy, reusable, and recyclable. Constructed with measurement lines, a leak resistant cap, and an easy grip handle, our urinal bottles are a great choice for emergencies, truck drivers, travelers, campers, and more! Bottle measures approximately 3” L, 3.5” W, 9.75” H, and 2.125” mouth diameter.

Clear Measurement Lines: Our calibrated urinal bottle is embossed with easy-to-read numbers. Our urinal bottle has measurements in ounces from 1 ounce to 35 ounces in increments of 5. Our scale is also measured with milliliters in increments of 50 up to 1,000 ml.

Leak Resistant Lid: Our plastic urinal bottles come with an attached screw-on top to prevent leaks and spills. The airtight lid also helps to keep odors enclosed in the bottle. Our lids even glow in the dark, making it easy to find at night time. For best results, be sure to expose the lid to light for at least 20 minutes. The lid can glow for approximately half an hour after being in direct light. *May vary depending on your light source.

Easy Grip Handle: Our urinal bottles have a 5.5” long easy grip handle that provides maximum stability while in use or emptying to avoid accidental spills. The square shape of our bottle allows you to stand it both vertically and horizontally. It also helps you save storage space on counter tops, bathroom cabinets, and/or drawers.
